genius.gui.panels

Class IntegerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.listener.DefaultListenable<java.lang.Integer>
      • genius.gui.panels.IntegerModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listenable<java.lang.Integer>, Lockable

    public class IntegerModel
extends DefaultListenable<java.lang.Integer>
implements Lockable
    Model for Integer values. This improves type checking and also allows us to use it with sliders. Changes on the lock and on value are reported.

      • setLock

        public void setLock(boolean isLock)
        Specified by:
        setLock in interface Lockable
        Parameters:
        isLock - if true, the value can not be changed. The listeners of the object should be notified about lock changes. The GUI should also reflect this setting eg by greying out the item.

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        Specified by:
        isLocked in interface Lockable
        Returns:
        true if the value is locked and can't be changed.
